metadata.title: CVE-2019-10053 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.x before 4.1.4. If the input of thefunction SSHParseBanner is composed only of a \n character, then theprogram runs into a heap-based buffer over-read. This occurs because theerroneous search for \r results in an integer underflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:4.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.4-1').
